summary: Adds a stand-alone voluptuous female follower to Skyrim. She is a sorceress who wields a shield, conjures lightning and frost magic, and comes with her own personal mount and home base.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][img]https://imgur.com/40kwv8g.jpg[/img][/font][/center]



[font=Verdana][size=4]Summary[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Batheile is a beautiful battle-mage/sorceress who wields a shield and summons the power of lightning and ice. Though she excels at magic, she has limited knowledge in physical combat, and therefore does not use most types of long range and melee weapons, but can fight at close quarters using her shield. She will gladly aid you in combat, and will ride side by side with you during your travels. She is sometimes seen near the mysterious Lady Stone, or occasionally relaxing at the Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead. Being a foreigner in Skyrim, Batheile may entrust you to give her a fashion makeover when she is in your party.[/size][/font]



[font=Verdana][size=4]Details[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Class: shield-mage/sorceress[/size]
[size=2]Weapon: shield[/size]
[size=2]Skills: lightning and frost spells, shield bash[/size]
[size=2]Location/s: Lady Stone, Frostfruit Inn at Rorikstead, Batheile's Hideout[/size]
[size=2]Essential: yes[/size]
[size=2]Marriage: possible[/size]
[size=2]Body: custom CBBE-based[/size]
[size=2]Voice: female sultry[/size][/font]



[font=Verdana][size=4]Features[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]travels between a number of locations within Skyrim when not in the player's party[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]owns her own mount, and can ride it when necessary[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]has her own headquarters in Skyrim[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]comes with her own bodyguard to defend her home[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]has accessible dialogue options to change her armor/clothes [i][color=#6aa84f]([b]NOTE:[/b] alternate equipment located in chests in Batheile's Hideout)[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]can provide a special potion once a day, accessible through her dialogue option[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]includes a simple fix for the missing dialogue audio files of followers with the female sultry voice type[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]has a simple initial quest to unlock her as a follower [i][color=#6aa84f]([b]NOTE:[/b] to initialize quest, look for an object located behind the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood)[/color][/i][/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Lore[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2][spoiler][/size][size=4]Background[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Legend speaks of a secret and forgotten cult‒likely the most powerful group among Dibellan sects‒which served the goddess of beauty through erotic rituals and sacrifices. It is said that their worshippers, some of whom possessed demigod-like powers, were directly descended from the goddess herself. Once in every generation, a newborn girl was handpicked by Dibella to serve as her regent, who would receive great power and beauty by bathing in her divine breast milk and bodily fluids. The chosen one would henceforth be revered as the Endowed.[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]People have varying opinions as to the cause of the cult's demise. Most treat the stories as mere myth, while some believe that descendants of Dibella are real, and a few still exist scattered all over Tamriel. Conspiracy scholars have traced a bloodline which originates from an uncharted island to the far north, believed to be the portal by which immortals and deities crossed over. No outsider has been able to reach the island, and scholars have yet to find evidence of the ancestry of the local inhabitants.[/size][/font]



[font=Verdana][size=4]Profile[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Batheile is the youngest princess of a little-known remote island in the far north. On the night she was born, cold and raging storm winds destroyed their home, causing her family to attempt to flee the island. The infant Batheile was almost frozen from head to toe when a mysterious lady had compassion on her and healed her. Since that day, she has has spent a great deal of time searching for answers about her origin and purpose.[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Being the last heiress to her family's throne, Batheile grew up rarely being allowed to leave the island or interact with outsiders. Nevertheless, she learned to become an adept mage who can conjure the power of the storm. Despite her frigid environment, she has never been accustomed to wearing thick armor, and instead depends on her trusty shield for physical protection.[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][size=2]After years of study and training, Batheile was deemed ready to venture beyond her island. Accompanied by a small party consisting of her loyal steed and one of her best bodyguards, she has embarked on a journey to Skyrim, in an attempt to restore her clan. She hopes to achieve this through an audience with Dibella, believing that it was the goddess who saved her life years ago, by granting her the power of the Endowed.[/size][/font]



[font=Verdana][img]https://i.imgur.com/6O4CNXw.png[/img][size=2][/spoiler][/size][/font]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Issues/Incompatibilities[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]occasional bugs or delays may be caused by the horse-mounting and combat scripts[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]has not been extensively tested with other mods[/size][/font]
[/list]
[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][i][color=#e06666](untested)[/color][/i] may have compatibility issues with the options for changing outfits in follower overhaul mods[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][i][color=#e06666](untested)[/color][/i] may be incompatible with follower mount mods[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Requirements[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]latest version of Skyrim[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and Hearthfire DLCs[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Recommendations[/size][size=2] (IMPORTANT: may cause minor issues when not installed)

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37481]NetImmerse Override[/url] or [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]Racemenu[/url]﻿ (includes NetImmerse Override)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Optional Recommendations[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53396/]Sexy Idle﻿ Animation[/url]﻿﻿ (recommended: [i][color=#cfe2f3]Animation 3[/color][/i] or [i][color=#cfe2f3]Animation 4[/color][/i])[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11954/]Pretty Female Idles[/url]﻿ (recommended: [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 00[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 01[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 01_Extra[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 03[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 04[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 05[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 06[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 07[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 08[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 08_Extra[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 09[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 10[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 11[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 12[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 13[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 13_Extra[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 15[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 15_Extra[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 17[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 18[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 19_slim[/color][/i], [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 19_Extra[/color][/i], or [i][color=#cfe2f3]Style 20[/color][/i])[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54521/]FNIS Sexy Move[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Installation[/size][/font]

[list=1]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Download and install SKSE and XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][i][color=#e06666](highly recommended)[/color][/i] Download and install the mods listed under the Recommendations section above.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][i][color=#93c47d](optional)[/color][/i] Download and install the mods listed under the Optional Recommendations section above.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][color=#f6b26b][i](if necessary)[/i][/color] If previous versions of this mod were installed, uninstall them completely.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Download [b]Batheile the Endowed[/b] found under the Main Files section.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Using a mod manager such as NMM, install [i]Batheile the Endowed-89088-#-#-#.7z[/i].[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Notes & Warnings[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]NSFW, adults-only mod[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]outfit options are still limited; you may create compatible outfits through [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url][/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]please minimize dis/mounting of horses during combat to avoid potential bugs[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]please use Batheile's built-in dialogue option for changing her outfit instead of the outfit-change options that come with follower overhaul mods (if you have any installed) to avoid potential bugs[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]Please let me know if there are any problems/incompatibilities/requirements I missed.[/size][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Possible Future Improvements[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim compatibility[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]testing for compatibility with HDT Bounce and Jiggles CBBE Edition[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]more outfits and equipment[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]additional skills and magic[/size][/font] - [i][font=Verdana][color=orange][size=2]partially done[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]mesh improvements[/size][/font] - [i][font=Verdana][color=orange][size=2]partially done[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2]quests[/size][/font] - [i][font=Verdana][color=orange][size=2]partially done[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[*][font=Verdana][size=2][s]additional combat damage[/s] - [/size][i][font=Verdana][color=#6aa84f][size=2]done[/size][/color][/font][/i][/font]
[/list]


[font=Verdana][size=4]Credits[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][size=2][spoiler][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]﻿ by Caliente

Halo's Poser by Halofarm[/spoiler][/size][/font]
